•	Committing to enlist as a volunteer trainer.
We will greatly appreciate donated skills such as fashion design,hair dressing,interior decoration,catering, IT,web design,graphic design and much more•	Raising awareness in your own charity, neighborhood and the public 
around the world about this cause.You might consider sharing the campaign page on
your Facebook or Twitter, or even by joining our social media team!
 
 Please email us
at   
Iamlat14@yahoo.com
If you would like to donate but are unable to do so online, or if you’d like to join our team!

story:
Mathematics and Our Future

Hi, My name is Derrick R. Louis and I've owned and operated an "in-home" tutoring company called Arithmetic Solutions since January of 2005.  Over the years I have provided affordable Mathematics tutoring to inner-city youth by contracting with School Districts in the Los Angeles area, the largest of which being the Los Angeles Unified School District (LAUSD).  As of August 2013, LAUSD decided to eliminate third-party companies like Arithmetic Solutions from the process of providing much needed free tutoring services to our students in the more impoverished areas of Los Angeles.  Although "some" students still receive free tutoring on certain school campuses after school, a large number have no tutoring at all.  My goal is to bring another option to these students that is affordable for the parents and highly accessible for the students.

Our Goal and Our Needs

    We have begun the process of building an Online Tutoring Platform on which students can access high quality Mathematics Tutoring in the comforts of their own homes through the use of "real-time" audio & video.  Once our online tutoring campaign is launched, we will have the capacity to tutor students in small groups online which cuts travel expenses and related insurance costs which in turn drives the cost for services down for the inner-city parent.  

     The $10,000.00 is needed to complete the process of building out the platform and imbedding it into our existing website.  A portion will be used to mobilize a contingent of individuals to canvas areas in Los Angeles that we have identified as the most adversely affected.  We will inform parents of the fact that they do have another option.  Their child need not fall behind.  Our goal is to target those students who are motivated to address Mathematics & Science, but do not have access because of their Geographic Location and/or Socio-Economic status. Lastly, a portion will be used to purchase learning materials that reflect the NEW Common Core Standards and integrate these materials into our tutoring program. Ultimately we'd like to provide low-cost mathematics tutoring services to 500 students each school year.

     If we do not reach our goal, all collected funds will still go to the expenditures listed above, but to lesser degrees.

The Impact

     Your contribution will aid in helping disadvantaged students receive affordable academic help that could realistically change the direction of their lives.  Many in areas such as South Central Los Angeles don't have the fundamental resources most of us take for granted.  Not everyone has a car to transport their child to a learning center for tutoring and far fewer have the $80.00 per hour to pay for services once they arrive.  In building this Online Tutoring Platform, we would be able to help the students where they are.  Providing quality tutoring services while at the same time reducing the cost per hour by up to 75% of the industry average. You will also help students make the difficult transition to the NEW Common Core Standards which will better their chances of being accepted to the colleges of their choice.

     If you visit the California Department of Education (CDE) website you'll see that Arithmetic Solutions has been an approved Supplemental Educational Services (SES) Provider since 2006.  As result, we have provided FREE mathematics tutoring services to hundreds of students throughout Southern California with a 93.5% success rate in raising the students' scores from their pre-test to their post-test.  The free services were federally funded by the No Child Left Behind Act of 2001 through the local school districts.  Although many of the smaller school districts in Southern California continue to use these funds to provide free services, LAUSD the 2nd largest school district in the country, decided to redirect these funds away from the 38,000 eligible students who severely need them.  Even though some students did receive free after-school tutoring during the 2013-2014 school year, the vast majority of them received no support services at all.  We have the trained personnel to provide services and we DO continue to provide FREE services to various districts around Los Angeles, but we still feel an obligation to those students who were cut-off last year; this Online Tutoring Platform can help us reach them.

Risks & Challenges

     Believe it or not, our biggest challenge is APATHY on the side of a disenfranchised population.  Parents and students in impoverished neighborhoods not only in Los Angeles, but in similar cities throughout the U.S., tend to give up or ask themselves, "why try?" when opportunity can be so easily taken away from them by a few individuals who possess political clout.  The Challenge is speaking to these disenfranchised families and convincing them that they can succeed and we have a vehicle that can help them do so.  They are not forgotten.  There are people who started from where they are that are in a position to help today!  The Risk is that our outreach falls on deaf ears and no one sees the value in our efforts.

     This is why our campaign has to allocate some of raised funds toward community outreach.  We will inform churches, sports leagues, public and private schools, etc... of our goals and how we can help their students reach their academic goals by utilizing a resource that they probably thought was out of their reach.  

     All in all, because our infrastructure has been in place for 9-years and we have a program that works, a program that has already garnered results for students in Los Angeles, we do mitigate our own risk to a degree.  Many in the community already know of us; all we want to do is introduce a new product to them that is backed by years of positive results from the in-home tutoring for which we are so well known.

    Other Ways You Can Help

         You can help us by letting people in and around Los Angeles know about the numbers of students who no longer have access to the tutoring services that are so desperately needed.  Let other potential donors know that we are in Los Angeles on the grassroots level helping students reach their goals.  Mathematics & Science can be made available to everyone, we do not care where you live.  Please use the networking and social media tools that Indiegogo has right here to inform your friends.

story:
My name is Greg Douquet and I'm a recently retired U.S. Marine colonel and career aviator.  Shortly before my retirement I had the great fortune of meeting my friend Lou Sabatini and we soon discovered a shared passion for aviation and for service.  Lou introduced me to an outfit that he'd been flying and serving for years, Mercy Medical Angels, a charity dedicated to no cost air transportation for financially stressed people requiring medical care throughout the Mid-Atlantic area and beyond. Our branch of Mercy Medical Angels, Bonanza Angels, are a small group of all-volunteer pilots who have been flying the BE-36 Beechcraft Bonanza based in Manassas, VA for almost 40 mishap-free years in service of wounded warriors, children and adults with severe illnesses who have need for a stretcher equipped airplane. The organization is made up entirely of pilots like myself and other volunteers and has been consistently rated by Charity Navigator, a charity rating service, as one of the highest percentage of benefit for patients vs overhead out of the thousands of charities they rate.

The Bonanza Angel is a unique airplane. Conventionally configured as a 6 passenger airplane, N7709R has been modified to include a Lifeport stretcher, a seat for family or caregiver in addition to seats for the 2 pilots (we almost always fly with 2 pilots although we are certified for single pilot operation). Advanced electronics allow us to operate in today’s modern airspace and avoid bad weather. 

Lately Bonanza Angel has fallen on hard times. One of our main sources of income, the Combined Federal Campaign, has seen pledges fall sharply. 

I am asking you if you would be willing to make a contribution towards Bonanza Angel. Our goal is to raise $40,000 to fund next year’s operation and continue to provide the community with our greatly needed service.  Even if we don't achieve this goal, you can count on us stretching whatever we do receive into as many Angel flights as we can.

If you are able to help, even a small amount would make a big difference in paying for a Bonanza Angel flight (about $500), hangar, insurance for the airplane, or some gas.  

In return, we'd be happy to send you the heartfelt thank you notes we routinely receive from our patients and their families, and you'd know that your generosity went towards making a needy person that much healthier.

Please help us get the word out about this campaign and please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
WHO WE ARE

Lighthouse Community Charter School prepares a diverse, K-12th grade student population for college and the career of their choice by equipping each child and youth with the skills, knowledge, and tools to become a self-motivated, competent, lifelong learner.

We were founded by a committed group of teachers and parents, where Lighthouse opened its doors in 2002 in downtown Oakland in a renovated storefront that served 92 students in grades K-6. In that first year, the school employed 7 full time staff members. Twelve years and four addresses later, the school has grown to serve over 720 students in grades K–12 supported and taught by 100 faculty and staff members.

Dedicated to serving a student population that has been historically underserved by the traditional school system, Lighthouse Community Charter School provides a much-needed option for students and their families in Oakland, California. Lighthouse is comprised of two contiguous schools, one serving grades K–8 and the other serving grades 9–12.

After 12 years of being open and serving the students of Oakland, some of our students have been with us since the start and almost are leaving us to attend college! We are extremely proud of all our students achievements and we want to celebrate one last time by having our Grad Night at Disneyland in Southern California. As a close knit community that we are, we want to have the opportunity to close off the year together before everyone goes their separate paths to success. 

WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET

The Senior Grad Night will take place in Disneyland down in Southern California on next year in June where we will take all of our 52 seniors. In order for this to become a reality we need YOUR help to help fundraise $10,000!

Where exactly is your money going? We have broken it down here for you!

  • Each ticket for the Disneyland Grad Nights costs $75/person, which will include all of our 52 seniors plus our 4 amazing chaperones. This will come down to a grand total of $4,200!

  • Since we are traveling down to Southern California we will be using Peninsula Tours a charter bus company that will come down to $3,500.

  • Also, we will need to get a hotel for a driver that is taking us down to Disneyland, which will roughly be around $100.

  • We are going to be extremely hungry traveling down to Disneyland meaning we will need food to feed everyone!

  • The rest of the money will be used with anything else that miscellaneously comes up along the way.

What are the perks?

Are you ready? If you donate $5 you get awesome Lighthouse stickers, who wouldn’t want some of these? Lets continue if you donate $50, you get handmade buttons from some of our seniors plus some Lighthouse stickers. If you donate $100, you get a handwritten thank you letter from one of our seniors, plus the buttons and stickers! It doesn’t stop there, donate $250 and you get your own printed Lighthouse shirt, thank you letter, stickers, and more buttons. We are moving up, if you donate $500 you get your own plaque made and designed by our seniors using our donated laser cutter. More than that you get a letter, buttons, stickers, and your own shirt.. Last but certainly not least, donate $1000 (AH!) and you receive a personalized thank you video, updates on the trip, plus everything else mentioned above!

THE IMPACT

Throughout their four years of high school these students have faced rigorous academic challenges and have worked incredibly hard, but more than that they have overcome obstacles outside of school. Our students have been challenged, but have yet to be celebrated with a trip for their extensive dedication for the past four years.  Many of these students have attended this school for over 12 years and this trip will be a reward not only for their hard work, but for their success that is ahead of them.  In their 4 years of high school, the class of 2015  has exemplified their incredible academic capabilities while demonstrating compassion and respect towards each other and the Lighthouse community. The trip will be the last time the students enjoy a memory together, serving as a reminder of their high school experience. In addition, we hope this field trip will light an initiative spark for their younger peers to step up as leaders to plan their own trips given that this is the very first time a class attempts to fund a project of this size.    

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP!

Can’t contribute? That’s OK! Please make sure to share this with everyone on social media to help spread the word.

*If you can’t donate using a credit card feel free to send concealed cash or checks addressed to Stelet Kim to our address at 444 Hegenberger Rd Oakland, CA 94621 

Want to learn more about Lighthouse Community Charter School? Visit us online at http://lighthousecharter.org/

story:
"The afflictions of poverty don’t just disappear after a student gets into college." - Washington Post

Since 2008, Writers in Baltimore Schools (WBS) has served 600+ low-income secondary school students. As these children grow, they come face to face with an alarming community statistic -- only 24 of them will obtain a college diploma by age 28 (4%). Many of the bright young girls and boys who have overcome the obstacles of the admissions process drop out due to tuition or auxiliary fees they cannot pay. Even after receiving grants and loans, most students at Baltimore's Morgan State University, for example, come up 20% short.

Terrell Kellam is one of these students. Although already a vibrant part of the Morgan State campus as a freshman, his continued attendance is a daily uncertainty.  "Truthfully, after this semester, I'm not even sure I'll be attending this school," Kellam told the Washington Post. Read Terrell's story here:

Why Poor Kids Don't Stay in College (Washington Post / Oct. 20, 214)

Terrell, for his talent, drive, and commitment to furthering his education, will be the inaugural recipient of the WBS College Bridge Scholarship, the keystone of WBS’ new College Bridge Program. By supporting this program, you can ensure that both Terrell and future students have the basic means to achieve a college diploma.

"College students who come from low-income backgrounds ... see the least chance of college success. They are less likely to begin college, less likely to finish." - Washington Post


“College is absolutely the next step I need in life, not only to better myself but also to better society,” Kellam said.


College Bridge Program

The College Bridge Program is aimed at the needs of students entering college from impoverished backgrounds. In middle school, students join WBS' weekly creative writing groups. In high school, students stay involved through our sleep-away writing camp and by working as junior counselors. Now, with the launch of the College Bridge Program to help our students transition to college, WBS will be able to equip our students with college application skills and sustain our well-established relationships with them through high school and into college.
Our students have often called WBS their second family. The College Bridge Program will capitalize on this relationship to provide a trusting community for college preparation.


Help us get the College Bridge Program off the ground! Your support will fund:

  • Need-based College Bridge scholarship for Writers in Baltimore Schools students

  • College application seminar series (College Apps 101, College Essay Writing, Resume Writing)

Who We Are

Writers in Baltimore Schools provides low-income school students with a vibrant environment for literary development through in-school, after-school, and summer creative writing workshops taught by Baltimore writers.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and by e-mail. Easy sharing with the Indiegogo Share Tools!

100% of every donation is tax-deductible through WBS's fiscal agent, Fusion Partnerships, Inc., and goes towards helping low-income students transition to college.

story:
Spark the Next Gen: Hawaii

Wildfires are becoming more and more of an issue in the State of Hawaii. Over the past decade, an average of over 1,000 wildfires burned over 17,000 acres each year in Hawaii, with the percentage of total land area burned comparable to and often exceeding the rest of the U.S. Wildfires can threaten just about anyone and anything in Hawaii. Intense smoke has sent people to hospitals, much of the native forests have burned up, coral reefs have dwindled from post-fire erosion, ranchers have lost quality forage for their cattle. These are just some of the many impacts of wildfire in Hawaii. At its worst, homes and lives can be lost. 

As the only 501(c)(3) non-profit in the State of Hawaii focused on wildfire preparedness, protection, and recovery, Hawaii Wildfire Management Organization (HWMO) has made great strides in improving the livelihood of Hawaii's residents and tourists while protecting its sensitive and critical natural resources. 

It all starts with education. HWMO has created a K-8 Curriculum  that emphasizes fire safety and the values of practicing stewardship (caring for the ʻaina.) We have also developed the first Hawaii-specific Ready, Set, Go! program to teach families techniques for protecting their home and creating an emergency preparedness plan.

We are a small non-profit with a total of five excellent, passionate staff members with a huge responsibility working on issues that are completely under-addressed in our State and affect critical resources. Your contributions will help us expand the reach of our education programs, the number of program offerings, and the numbers of communities we can support. We will be able to put on more workshops, school presentations, and fire preparedness events, to name a few. Most of our education efforts have been Hawaii Island-based, but with your assistance, we'll be able to make an impact on the other main islands (Kauai, Oahu, Maui)!

By taking action with us, Hawaii can continue to be the beautiful home that it is for over a million residents and the incredible destination spot for millions of tourists from around the world.


What We Need

Every dollar you contribute will go a long way - pun intended. The more we receive, the further our reach will be. We want to expand our outreach to communities in Maui, Oahu, and Kauai (and within Hawaii Island) - $50,000 can help us get off and running (realistically, flying). 

Funds will go towards:

  • Travel (i.e. airfare, car rental, gas, facility rental)
  • Printing (i.e. curriculum materials, informational brochures, wildfire-risk maps)
  • Garden supplies for our Waikoloa Wildfire Dryland Wildfire Safety Park (a demo park that we use to actively demonstrate measures families can take to reduce wildfire risk on and around their homes)
  • Operational Needs (i.e. rent, business and health insurance)
We, of course, would love to reach and exceed our goal, but even if we don't this time round, all funds will be used to expand our outreach campaign.

Far-Reaching Impacts

Hawaii's precious landscapes and extraordinarily kind and welcoming people can be appreciated by visitors from all over the world. Hawaii is a destination and a home that is under the direct threat of a changing climate and increasing drought periods, which have consequently exacerbated the wildfire threat. To add fuel to the fire, a boom in the population of the State of Hawaii has meant a huge increase in wildfire ignitions (over 98% of fires today are accidentally or maliciously caused by humans). That's why reaching out to people of all ages is the first step in reducing the wildfire threat. 

HWMO has made great strides in increasing fire safety and preparedness through school presentations, workshops, and booth events. One of our highlight programs is our Waikoloa Dryland Wildfire Safety Park. We created and continue to maintain and use this space as a valuable tool for teaching community members about how they can create defensible space and secure their structures to reduce the wildfire risk of their home. What makes the space unique is that we use primarily native, drought-tolerant plants as a way to defend the home from wildfire. Better yet, the caretakers of this land are kids we bring from local schools and programs who've turned into mind-blowing experts on fire safety, fire ecology, and Hawaii's native plants. 

It's programs like these that keep us motivated and give us hope that Hawaii will become a safer place to live.


The Challenges We Can Overcome

One of the main challenges we face is actually a critical hurdle for us to make progress: most people, including community and governmental decision-makers and residents, don't think of wildfire when they think Hawaii. Our goal is to change that level of awareness to one where wildfire is a concern worth noting and taking action for because it is a such a real danger.

Although we are understaffed, our strong, broad-reaching partnerships with first responders, land managers, community associations and organizations allow us to tap into a vast pool of expertise that is grassroots-based. With these strong bonds, we have been and will continue to overcome our challenges.


    Help Can Come in Many Different Ways

    If you can't contribute today, we understand and there are many more ways you can help that don't necessarily mean $$$. 

    Please help us get the word out about this campaign and about Hawaii's wildfire struggles via social media (#sparknextgen) and plain word of mouth.

    Our website is: hawaiiwildfire.org

    Remember, you have an array of Indiegogo share tools you can use!


    We appreciate your help - it means a lot to us and will make a great difference in the beautiful State of Hawaii!
story_txt:
Spark the Next Gen: Hawaii Wildfires are becoming more and more of an issue in the State of Hawaii. Over the past decade, an average of over 1,000 wildfires burned over 17,000 acres each year in Hawaii, with the percentage of total land area burned comparable to and often exceeding the rest of the U.S. Wildfires can threaten just about anyone and anything in Hawaii. Intense smoke has sent people to hospitals, much of the native forests have burned up, coral reefs have dwindled from post-fire erosion, ranchers have lost quality forage for their cattle. These are just some of the many impacts of wildfire in Hawaii. At its worst, homes and lives can be lost. 
As the only 501(c)(3) non-profit in the State of Hawaii focused on wildfire preparedness, protection, and recovery, Hawaii Wildfire Management Organization (HWMO) has made great strides in improving the livelihood of Hawaii's residents and tourists while protecting its sensitive and critical natural resources. 
It all starts with education. HWMO has created a K-8 Curriculum  that emphasizes fire safety and the values of practicing stewardship (caring for the ʻaina.) We have also developed the first Hawaii-specific Ready, Set, Go! program to teach families techniques for protecting their home and creating an emergency preparedness plan.
We are a small non-profit with a total of five excellent, passionate staff members with a huge responsibility working on issues that are completely under-addressed in our State and affect critical resources. Your contributions will help us expand the reach of our education programs, the number of program offerings, and the numbers of communities we can support. We will be able to put on more workshops, school presentations, and fire preparedness events, to name a few. Most of our education efforts have been Hawaii Island-based, but with your assistance, we'll be able to make an impact on the other main islands (Kauai, Oahu, Maui)!
By taking action with us, Hawaii can continue to be the beautiful home that it is for over a million residents and the incredible destination spot for millions of tourists from around the world.

What makes the space unique is that we use primarily native, drought-tolerant plants as a way to defend the home from wildfire. Better yet, the caretakers of this land are kids we bring from local schools and programs who've turned into mind-blowing experts on fire safety, fire ecology, and Hawaii's native plants.

Although we are understaffed, our strong, broad-reaching partnerships with first responders, land managers, community associations and organizations allow us to tap into a vast pool of expertise that is grassroots-based. With these strong bonds, we have been and will continue to overcome our challenges.


  Help Can Come in Many Different Ways If you can't contribute today, we understand and there are many more ways you can help that don't necessarily mean $$$. 
Please help us get the word out about this campaign and about Hawaii's wildfire struggles via social media (#sparknextgen) and plain word of mouth.
Our website is: hawaiiwildfire.org
Remember, you have an array of Indiegogo share tools you can use!

We appreciate your help - it means a lot to us and will make a great difference in the beautiful State of Hawaii!

story:
Update: The Indiegogo online fundraising campaign is now closed. We haven't met out target yet, so we continue to raise funds. If you would like to fund the conference, please go here. God bless.

Who are we?

My name is Ngina Otiende. My husband, Tom and I are originally from Kenya, Africa and we moved to the United States three years ago.

While in Kenya, we helped organize marriage retreats and seminars for married couples. 

A few months ago, God laid it in our hearts to organize a special marriage conference for pastors, church leaders and their spouses in Kenya.

The Conference 

We will be working through a Kenyan marriage ministry called TwoShips Solutions.

Pastor Barnabas Achoki and his wife Grace Achoki, the founders of Twoships have a heart and passion for marriages in Africa. They want to see marriages healed and transformed across the continent and beyond.

Image; Pastor Barnabas & Grace

The goal of the two-day marriage conference - to be held in a small rural town called Kisii, 200 miles from the capital - will be to create a safe place for pastors and their spouses to share their burdens and find healing for their marriages.

They will learn how to minister to one another, in turn they can be effective ministers to their congregations.

How to Help

We would love for you to join us and help make this event a reality.

The cost of the conference is $ 3,325 for 35 couples (70 people in total).

The funds will go towards rooming, meals, hiring equipment, speaker fees, printing, telephone and campaign fees. 

The cost per couple is  $95 and you can sponsor a couple (or couples) in full.

But every bit counts; all amounts, small and great are welcome.

The Impact

  • Pastors and leaders marriages will be healed and refreshed. 
  •  As their marriages are changed and transformed, they will take the healing and transformation to their congregation. The ripple effect will be wide and strong at the community level.
  • By using local (Kenyan) marriage speakers and coaches, a couple familiar with the cultural and marital landscape, the impact is greater; Kenyans are impacting other Kenyans.

Risks and challenges

* To be honest my husband and I were hesitant to ask people to fund this event. We have been believing God to supply for this event in a way that did NOT involve ASKING OTHERS for funds.

Nonetheless as we have prayed, trusted and talked to a few people, and as the day of the conference draws nearer (March 2015), we have felt a release towards making this project public and to trust God to touch people to give.

If God chooses to provide for this event using this channel, we will be very grateful. Either way we know He will provide in the way He chooses, just as He has done in the past. 

Other Ways to Help

  • PRAY for the conference, for the pastors and the planning of the event.
  • Share this need on your Facebook and Twitter and other social media channels. Help us equip us Pastors in Kisii, Kenya.
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word.

Contact

Visit our website : http://intentionaltoday.com/
Get in touch with us: Click here
TwoShips ministry marriage blog http://marriagespiceup.blogspot.com/


And that's all there is to it. Thank you and God bless you.

story:
Miért érdemes támogatnod a Learnie.hu indulását?

Manapság az életünk jelentős része az online térben zajlik: itt dolgozunk, itt szórakozunk, itt vásárolunk. 

Az elmúlt 10 évben egy csomó szolgáltatás helyeződött át a fizikai valóságból az internetre: ha utazni szeretnénk, akkor az okostelefonunkkal Ubert hívunk. Ha nyelvet szeretnénk tanulni, elindítjuk a Duolingo-t. Könyvet Kindle-n olvasunk és Audible-n hallgatunk. Életünk érdekes pillanatait a Periscope-pal közvetítjük, Headspace-szel meditálunk, és Waze-t használunk papírtérkép helyett.

Sok minden alakult át az elmúlt néhány évben. Miért lenne ez alól az oktatás kivétel? 

Ki vagyok én és mi a célom?

Szombati Orsolya vagyok, a Profonte Management és Sales Akadémia alapítója. 15 éves tréneri-oktatói tapasztalattal a hátam mögött azt tűztem ki célul, hogy megreformáljam a hazai oktatási piacot. Egy olyan profi platformot szeretnék létrehozni a Learnie.hu elindításával, ahol online is ugyanolyan öröm és élmény a tanulás, mint a legszuperebb élő tréningen.

Ma már mindenhonnan azt halljuk, hogy "az idő pénz". Legyünk produktívak, könnyen elérhetőek, mobilisak, tájékozottak, és naprakészek.  Ebbe pedig egyre nehezebben fér bele, hogy  az egész napunkat (vagy többet) az iskolapadban vagy a tréningteremben ülve töltsük. Okosabban kell beosztani azt, amiből mindenkinek ugyanannyi van: az időt. Ez tudom, hogy nem mindig könnyű feladat, így néha pont arra jut belőle kevés, amire a legnagyobb szükség van: a tanulásra, a fejlődésre.

Trénerként, oktatóként ma is őszintén hiszek abban, hogy a tanulásnak helye van, Sőt! rendkívül fontos helye van az életünkben. Azonban, annak a formának, ahogy a tudás eljut hozzánk, változnia kell. 

Az én célom az, hogy a Learnie.hu -val egy olyan platformot hozzak létre,

  • amely a nap 24 órájában, az év 365 napján áll a rendelkezésedre,
  • ahova minden egyes nap örömmel és őszinte lelkesedéssel lépsz be,
  • ahol a szerzők szigorú feltételek szerint vannak válogatva és szűrve, így biztosítva azt, hogy te valóban csak a legjobb tananyagok között válogathass,
  • ahol az oktatók megtisztelnek azzal, hogy nem egy fehér fal előtt állva, vagy ppt preziben “hangalámondva” magyaráznak, hanem a tudást exkluzív, igényes és élvezetes megjelenési formában adják át neked,
  • ahol minden egyes kurzus anyagába kockázatmentesen betekinthetsz,
  • ahol az oktatók a saját kurzusaikat folyamatosan frissítik, aktualizálják és amelyekhez értékes letölthető anyagokat (munkafüzeteket, csekklistákat, mintákat, segédleteket, esettanulmányokat) készítenek neked,
  • és ahol a kurzusok okostelefonon, táblagépeken és okostévéken egyaránt elérhetőek…

Hogy te akkor, ott, és annyi időben tanulj, ami a legjobban megfelel neked. Legyen szó akár a szakmai dolgokról, akár a hobbidról, akár a vállalkozásod vagy a személyes képességeid fejlesztéséről! 

Legyen a Learnie.hu  az a hely, ahol a számodra megfelelő kurzust megszerzed!

Ha pedig olyan tudás van a birtokodban, amely mások számára is értékes, amellyel jobbá teheted az életét az embereknek, akkor legyen a Learnie.hu az a hely, amelyen keresztül a tudásod átadod másoknak!

Mit mondanak rólam a tréningjeim résztvevői?============================================================

„Tévedtem, és kiderült: tévedni nem csak emberi dolog, de hasznos is lehet!

A beharangozókban egyetlen olyan momentum volt, ami miatt úgy döntöttem, megnézem Orsiék tréningjét. Ehhez képest több olyan "egymillió forintos" mondatot kaptam, melyekért külön-külön is érdemes volt elmenni.

 Azt az "apróságot" akár nem is számítva, hogy klassz hangulatban, kellemes társaságban új, emberi és de vállalkozói szempontból is hasznos ismeretségekre tettem szert, mindenféle kategorizálás nélkül: MINDENKINEK AJÁNLOM!” 

(Vajthó Gábor)

============================================================

„Szeretném megköszönni neked a tegnapi tréninget!

Az utóbbi 3-4 év konferenciái, workshopjai, online szemináriumai között toronymagasan a legjobb volt a tréninged. Sokszor már annak is örülök, ha egy klassz mondatot hallok ezeken a képzéseken, nálad pedig az elsőtől az utolsó percig záporoztak a hasznos infók, méghozzá szórakoztató előadásban, sok jó sztorival. Tetszett a csapatmunka, és a sok feladattal már a helyszínen sikerült az ügyfél típusú értékesítés lényegét elsajátítani.

Imádtam a tréninghelyszínt, volt lelke és stílusa.” 

(Pajkó Andrea)

============================================================

Mihez kérem a támogatásod?

A Learnie.hu online felületeinek elindításához. A mai napon már 12 darab, igényes környezetben, profi módon felvett és vágott videokurzus és a hozzá kapcsolódó számos letölthető anyag várja, hogy a tiéd legyen a Learnie.hu-n keresztül. Több szerzővel vagyunk a tárgyalások utolsó szakaszában, akik segítségével az őszi induláskor minőségi kurzusokkal tervezzük bővíteni a kínálatot. 

Ezek között van jobb agyféltekés rajzoktatás, bútorfestés, fotózás, kötés és horgolás, jogi témák vállalkozóknak, instagram és facebook marketing, célkitűzés, személyi edzés, sminktanfolyam, önismeret, értékesítés és online marketing, márkaépítés kézművesek számára, cégvezetés és motiválás, prezentációs technika és időgazdálkodás.

Ahhoz azonban, hogy a célom 100%-ban valósággá váljon, és a Learnie.hu valóban egy 100%-ban modern tanulófelület legyen, szükségem van a te támogatásodra is.

Mit kell tenned, ha támogatni szeretnél minket és a Learnie.hu indulását?

1.) A jobb oldali sávban válaszd ki azt a csomagot, amire szükséged van, és kattints bele a csomagba, majd a "Get this perk" (=Kérem ezt a csomagot) gombra!

2.) Ha olyan csomagot választottál, amely kiküldendő terméket is tartalmaz, akkor a következő oldalon add meg a szállítási címedet, és a bankkártya adataidat! (Ha csak szolgáltatást választottál, akkor csak a bankkártya adataidat kéri a rendszer.)

Ne aggódj, a fizetési rendszer teljesen zárt és maximálisan biztonságos!

3.) Nézd át, hogy minden rendben van-e, minden adatot helyesen írtál-e be. 

4.) Ha minden oké, akkor a jobb oldalsávban kattints a “Submit Payment” (=Fizetés) gombra, és már készen is vagy! :) Köszönöm a segítséged! :)

Az Indiegogo ezután le fogja vonni a választott csomag költségét a bankkártyádról. (A csomagok ára a rendszer sajátosságai miatt USD-ben van megadva, de a szöveges részben az összeget átszámoltam neked magyar forintra.)

És ha mégis elakadtál? 

Ha elakadsz valahol, vagy a nyelvi akadályok gördítenek eléd nehézséget, akkor sincs semmi gond! Hívj fel minket a 06-30-646-9959-es telefonszámon és örömmel segítünk! Kedves hangú kolléganőim végigvezetnek téged a szükséges lépéseken.

Ütemezés

A fejlesztéseknek jelenleg 3 szakasza van még hátra:

1.) 2016. május 31-ig tart az elinduláshoz szükséges forrás összegyűjtésének szakasza. 

2.) 2016. június 1. és augusztus 31. között készül el a Learnie.hu asztali verziója, valamint az az okostelefonos és táblagépes applikációja.

3.) 2016. szeptember 1-én pedig megnyomjuk a start gombot és útjára indítjuk a Learnie-t.

Miért érdemes már MOST csatlakoznod a támogatókhoz?

Mert ha a kampány támogatója vagy, akkor

  • jelentős kedvezménnyel juthatsz hozzá Orsi másik vállalkozása, a Sales Akadémia minden tréningjéhez és tananyagához.
  • jelentős kedvezményeket kaphatsz a 2016 szeptemberében induló Learnie.hu összes videokurzusához. 
  • oktatóént pedig jelentős kedvezménnyel csatlakozhatsz a Learnie.hu oktatói táborához.

Mikor kapsz számlát?

A számlát a kampány lezárta után fogjuk kiküldeni neked. A a számlázási adatokat Márti, Lenke vagy Vivien kolléganőm e-mailben vagy telefonon fogj bekérni tőled.  A számlát a Learnie.hu Kft. fogja kiállítani.

Mikor kapod meg a könyveket, DVD-ket, egyéb oktatóanyagokat? 

A termékeket a kampány 1. szakaszának lezárása után (2016. május 31. után), postán fogjuk elküldeni neked arra a címre, amit a támogatáskor megadtál. Ezt a biztonság kedvéért azért majd e-mailben is pontosítjuk veled.

Mikor kell fizetni szállítási díjat?

A szállítási költség Magyarország területére az általad választott csomag árában benne van. Ha külföldre szeretnéd kérni a csomagot, akkor kérlek, vedd fel velünk a kapcsolatot a info@learnie.hu e-mail címen, és Márti, Lenke vagy Vivien kolléganőm megírja neked a szállítási költséget.

Van kockázat?

Nincs. A Learnie.hu-t csak akkor indítjuk el, ha ez a közösségi finanszírozási kampány elérte a célját, és összegyűlt a kitűzött összeg. 

Ha valami oknál fogva ez mégsem sikerülne, a támogatásod akkor sem veszik el. Az a csomag, amit kiválasztottál mindenképpen a tied lesz! A termékeket a kampány 1. szakaszának lezárultával (2016. május 31-e után) postán elküldjük neked. A szolgáltatásokra fordított támogatásodat pedig 2016. május 31-e után teljes egészében felhasználhatod tréningre vagy konzultációra. 

De hát egy ilyen szuper dolog miért ne valósulna meg? :)

Most már mindent tudsz, ami szükséges ahhoz, hogy csatlakozz a támogatók táborához.

Ha te is hiszel abban, amiben én is hiszek: hogy itthon is szükség van arra, hogy az oktatás, a tanulás egy merőben új, modern és igényes formát vegyen online platformokon is, akkor: 

Támogasd a Learnie.hu indulását te is!
story_txt:
Miért érdemes támogatnod a Learnie.hu indulását?
Manapság az életünk jelentős része az online térben zajlik: itt dolgozunk, itt szórakozunk, itt vásárolunk. 
Az elmúlt 10 évben egy csomó szolgáltatás helyeződött át a fizikai valóságból az internetre: ha utazni szeretnénk, akkor az okostelefonunkkal Ubert hívunk. Ha nyelvet szeretnénk tanulni, elindítjuk a Duolingo-t. Könyvet Kindle-n olvasunk és Audible-n hallgatunk. Életünk érdekes pillanatait a Periscope-pal közvetítjük, Headspace-szel meditálunk, és Waze-t használunk papírtérkép helyett.
Sok minden alakult át az elmúlt néhány évben. Miért lenne ez alól az oktatás kivétel? 
Ki vagyok én és mi a célom?Szombati Orsolya vagyok, a Profonte Management és Sales Akadémia alapítója. 15 éves tréneri-oktatói tapasztalattal a hátam mögött azt tűztem ki célul, hogy megreformáljam a hazai oktatási piacot. Egy olyan profi platformot szeretnék létrehozni a Learnie.hu elindításával, ahol online is ugyanolyan öröm és élmény a tanulás, mint a legszuperebb élő tréningen.
Ma már mindenhonnan azt halljuk, hogy "az idő pénz". Legyünk produktívak, könnyen elérhetőek, mobilisak, tájékozottak, és naprakészek.  Ebbe pedig egyre nehezebben fér bele, hogy  az egész napunkat (vagy többet) az iskolapadban vagy a tréningteremben ülve töltsük. Okosabban kell beosztani azt, amiből mindenkinek ugyanannyi van: az időt. Ez tudom, hogy nem mindig könnyű feladat, így néha pont arra jut belőle kevés, amire a legnagyobb szükség van: a tanulásra, a fejlődésre.
Trénerként, oktatóként ma is őszintén hiszek abban, hogy a tanulásnak helye van, Sőt! rendkívül fontos helye van az életünkben. Azonban, annak a formának, ahogy a tudás eljut hozzánk, változnia kell. 

Az én célom az, hogy a Learnie.hu -val egy olyan platformot hozzak létre,

amely a nap 24 órájában, az év 365 napján áll a rendelkezésedre,
ahova minden egyes nap örömmel és őszinte lelkesedéssel lépsz be,
ahol a szerzők szigorú feltételek szerint vannak válogatva és szűrve, így biztosítva azt, hogy te valóban csak a legjobb tananyagok között válogathass,
ahol az oktatók megtisztelnek azzal, hogy nem egy fehér fal előtt állva, vagy ppt preziben “hangalámondva” magyaráznak, hanem a tudást exkluzív, igényes és élvezetes megjelenési formában adják át neked,
ahol minden egyes kurzus anyagába kockázatmentesen betekinthetsz,
ahol az oktatók a saját kurzusaikat folyamatosan frissítik, aktualizálják és amelyekhez értékes letölthető anyagokat (munkafüzeteket, csekklistákat, mintákat, segédleteket, esettanulmányokat) készítenek neked,
és ahol a kurzusok okostelefonon, táblagépeken és okostévéken egyaránt elérhetőek…

Hogy te akkor, ott, és annyi időben tanulj, ami a legjobban megfelel neked. Legyen szó akár a szakmai dolgokról, akár a hobbidról, akár a vállalkozásod vagy a személyes képességeid fejlesztéséről! Legyen a Learnie.hu  az a hely, ahol a számodra megfelelő kurzust megszerzed!
Ha pedig olyan tudás van a birtokodban, amely mások számára is értékes, amellyel jobbá teheted az életét az embereknek, akkor legyen a Learnie.hu az a hely, amelyen keresztül a tudásod átadod másoknak!
Mit mondanak rólam a tréningjeim résztvevői?============================================================„Tévedtem, és kiderült: tévedni nem csak emberi dolog, de hasznos is lehet!
A beharangozókban egyetlen olyan momentum volt, ami miatt úgy döntöttem, megnézem Orsiék tréningjét. Ehhez képest több olyan "egymillió forintos" mondatot kaptam, melyekért külön-külön is érdemes volt elmenni.
 Azt az "apróságot" akár nem is számítva, hogy klassz hangulatban, kellemes társaságban új, emberi és de vállalkozói szempontból is hasznos ismeretségekre tettem szert, mindenféle kategorizálás nélkül: MINDENKINEK AJÁNLOM!” (Vajthó Gábor)============================================================
„Szeretném megköszönni neked a tegnapi tréninget!
Az utóbbi 3-4 év konferenciái, workshopjai, online szemináriumai között toronymagasan a legjobb volt a tréninged. Sokszor már annak is örülök, ha egy klassz mondatot hallok ezeken a képzéseken, nálad pedig az elsőtől az utolsó percig záporoztak a hasznos infók, méghozzá szórakoztató előadásban, sok jó sztorival. Tetszett a csapatmunka, és a sok feladattal már a helyszínen sikerült az ügyfél típusú értékesítés lényegét elsajátítani.
Imádtam a tréninghelyszínt, volt lelke és stílusa.” (Pajkó Andrea)============================================================
Mihez kérem a támogatásod?
A Learnie.hu online felületeinek elindításához. A mai napon már 12 darab, igényes környezetben, profi módon felvett és vágott videokurzus és a hozzá kapcsolódó számos letölthető anyag várja, hogy a tiéd legyen a Learnie.hu-n keresztül. Több szerzővel vagyunk a tárgyalások utolsó szakaszában, akik segítségével az őszi induláskor minőségi kurzusokkal tervezzük bővíteni a kínálatot. 
Ezek között van jobb agyféltekés rajzoktatás, bútorfestés, fotózás, kötés és horgolás, jogi témák vállalkozóknak, instagram és facebook marketing, célkitűzés, személyi edzés, sminktanfolyam, önismeret, értékesítés és online marketing, márkaépítés kézművesek számára, cégvezetés és motiválás, prezentációs technika és időgazdálkodás.
Ahhoz azonban, hogy a célom 100%-ban valósággá váljon, és a Learnie.hu valóban egy 100%-ban modern tanulófelület legyen, szükségem van a te támogatásodra is.Mit kell tenned, ha támogatni szeretnél minket és a Learnie.hu indulását?1.) A jobb oldali sávban válaszd ki azt a csomagot, amire szükséged van, és kattints bele a csomagba, majd a "Get this perk" (=Kérem ezt a csomagot) gombra!2.) Ha olyan csomagot választottál, amely kiküldendő terméket is tartalmaz, akkor a következő oldalon add meg a szállítási címedet, és a bankkártya adataidat! (Ha csak szolgáltatást választottál, akkor csak a bankkártya adataidat kéri a rendszer.)Ne aggódj, a fizetési rendszer teljesen zárt és maximálisan biztonságos!3.) Nézd át, hogy minden rendben van-e, minden adatot helyesen írtál-e be. 4.) Ha minden oké, akkor a jobb oldalsávban kattints a “Submit Payment” (=Fizetés) gombra, és már készen is vagy! :) Köszönöm a segítséged! :)Az Indiegogo ezután le fogja vonni a választott csomag költségét a bankkártyádról. (A csomagok ára a rendszer sajátosságai miatt USD-ben van megadva, de a szöveges részben az összeget átszámoltam neked magyar forintra.)És ha mégis elakadtál? Ha elakadsz valahol, vagy a nyelvi akadályok gördítenek eléd nehézséget, akkor sincs semmi gond! Hívj fel minket a 06-30-646-9959-es telefonszámon és örömmel segítünk! Kedves hangú kolléganőim végigvezetnek téged a szükséges lépéseken.
Ütemezés
A fejlesztéseknek jelenleg 3 szakasza van még hátra:
1.) 2016. május 31-ig tart az elinduláshoz szükséges forrás összegyűjtésének szakasza. 
2.) 2016. június 1. és augusztus 31. között készül el a Learnie.hu asztali verziója, valamint az az okostelefonos és táblagépes applikációja.
3.) 2016. szeptember 1-én pedig megnyomjuk a start gombot és útjára indítjuk a Learnie-t.
Miért érdemes már MOST csatlakoznod a támogatókhoz?
Mert ha a kampány támogatója vagy, akkor

jelentős kedvezménnyel juthatsz hozzá Orsi másik vállalkozása, a Sales Akadémia minden tréningjéhez és tananyagához.


jelentős kedvezményeket kaphatsz a 2016 szeptemberében induló Learnie.hu összes videokurzusához. 

oktatóént pedig jelentős kedvezménnyel csatlakozhatsz a Learnie.hu oktatói táborához.


Mikor kapsz számlát?
A számlát a kampány lezárta után fogjuk kiküldeni neked. A a számlázási adatokat Márti, Lenke vagy Vivien kolléganőm e-mailben vagy telefonon fogj bekérni tőled.  A számlát a Learnie.hu Kft. fogja kiállítani.

Mikor kapod meg a könyveket, DVD-ket, egyéb oktatóanyagokat? 
A termékeket a kampány 1. szakaszának lezárása után (2016. május 31. után), postán fogjuk elküldeni neked arra a címre, amit a támogatáskor megadtál. Ezt a biztonság kedvéért azért majd e-mailben is pontosítjuk veled.
Mikor kell fizetni szállítási díjat?
A szállítási költség Magyarország területére az általad választott csomag árában benne van. Ha külföldre szeretnéd kérni a csomagot, akkor kérlek, vedd fel velünk a kapcsolatot a info@learnie.hu e-mail címen, és Márti, Lenke vagy Vivien kolléganőm megírja neked a szállítási költséget.
Van kockázat?
Nincs. A Learnie.hu-t csak akkor indítjuk el, ha ez a közösségi finanszírozási kampány elérte a célját, és összegyűlt a kitűzött összeg. 
Ha valami oknál fogva ez mégsem sikerülne, a támogatásod akkor sem veszik el. Az a csomag, amit kiválasztottál mindenképpen a tied lesz! A termékeket a kampány 1. szakaszának lezárultával (2016. május 31-e után) postán elküldjük neked. A szolgáltatásokra fordított támogatásodat pedig 2016. május 31-e után teljes egészében felhasználhatod tréningre vagy konzultációra. De hát egy ilyen szuper dolog miért ne valósulna meg? :)
Most már mindent tudsz, ami szükséges ahhoz, hogy csatlakozz a támogatók táborához.
Ha te is hiszel abban, amiben én is hiszek: hogy itthon is szükség van arra, hogy az oktatás, a tanulás egy merőben új, modern és igényes formát vegyen online platformokon is, akkor: Támogasd a Learnie.hu indulását te is!

story: My 6 year old son Finlay is autistic with sensory processing disorder. This makes him a particularly picky eater. I have found the only way to make sure he is getting the veggies he needs is to engage him in the garden. He will happily munch on a large range of edibles he has helped to grow, but as soon as they get in the kitchen it's a no-no. We have recently moved away from our lovely big established veggie garden to a rental property where we are mostly restricted to containers and there is no garden established. I'd also like this garden to be an inspiration to other families, so I'll be documenting the progress on my blog "The Apocaloptomist" and encourage community interaction. I'm always open to other parents coming and visiting to see how we integrate gardening into our lives.

story:
WHAT

A few months ago I started thinking about my 30th birthday.. I asked myself "What would you like to receive as present?". The answer was thougher than I expected.. No material presents were coming up to my mind, but just a very difficult one. 

I would like life to be sweeter for me, my family and the people I care about (well the rest of the world, too). Does it exist, can it exist a start-up of happiness? Is there any application for smart phones? 

Complicated. Pretty complicated.

So I thought I could be one of those who starts chains of happiness..

WHO

Well, there is a girl, Giada, my beautiful goddaughter who is one of the persons for whom I care more in my life. 

It's a long story of friendship and empathy, which started when she was 7 and I was 17. Giada was born with brain damages which caused a spastic tetraplegia and incapability of speaking, but didn't affect her intelligence and the awareness of her situation. The first time I met her I was just a volunteer, helping her with physiotherapy exercises. 13 years after I am her godmother, her friend and a sort of older sister. That's why I want her to be directly involved in my 30th birthday. I want all my friends to know her smile, helping me to help her in keeping it alive!

HOW

All your benevolent contributions are addressed to projects that I know Giada is following or wishes to follow, such as 

a) courses of facilitated communication

b) private course of philosophy

c) whatever else can make her happy

CONCLUSIONS

Thanks for your donation! Grazie mille per il vostro contributo!

story: One of the kindest most hard working people I know had his car broken into last weekend, and his laptop taken out from his bag (which he had hidden under a blanket for anyone shaking their head at leaving bags in cars). Atsushi has been working doggedly to finish up his thesis so he can graduate this summer and continue the inspiring ALS research he has been doing. He needs a laptop to do that and can't afford a new one. I've never made or started any sort of fundraising campaign before, but figured for Atsushi I would! He's the guy in the lab that takes his time to help anyone in need, or really anyone that he comes across. So I'm hoping you will take the time to help out this great graduate student in his worst graduate gloom. Just a few bucks will help! And in the future he'll be the one helping you out :) and I'll post more cute puppy pictures of my dog!

story:
Meeting JT Foxx the worlds #1 Wealth Coach and multi millionaire

Having a business meeting with JT Foxx to discuss the GW Corporation, he told me to change the name and the logo so it would be congruent with the Mission and Vision of the company.
I would like to thank JT Foxx and his team for the fantastic business advice and the energy they give when they are talking about business and South Africa.
To all you wonderful people, thank you very much for helping to move South Africa forward.
Yours Sincerely
Gunther Wallendorf

story:
Short Summary

Hey Guys!  My name is Dulcie and for the last 3 years I have been donating my time, energy, and money to a project called Real Hollywood Trainer.  Every week I upload a new FREE 40 minute workout video to YouTube, each video has a 5 minute health chat topic at the end.  I started doing it for free because I wanted to help the people of the world get fit.  I want to keep it free for the people of the world and continue my service but I need some help!  What started as a hobby has grown to a point where I'm spending so much time and energy on connecting with the people I help, because there are getting to be so many of them...I'd love to work less on my other jobs that pay and more on this one, but I have bills and I need to make money.

What We Need & What You Get

Every month I pay $200 to rent out the studio where I film for 1 hr each week, it would be nice if I could raise that payment for a few months.  Also, the cost of my website each year...it would be awesome if I could get that sponsored too from this campaign.  Anything over that would just be a way to say "Thanks for the FREE workouts Dulcie!"
 
In exchange for your donations, of course you can do my FREE workouts online.  In addition though, I can create a customized 30 or 60 day video plan for you, or send you a Disc version video file of one or two workouts.  For extra special donations, I'll make you a personalized "Thank You" video.

The Impact

Help me help people around the world get fit.  I have subscribers in all countries of the world.  I get about 10,000 views of all my free workouts each day on YouTube.  I have over 100 free workout videos online already...I want to continue and do more.

Other Ways You Can Help

Watch my workout videos, subscribe to my YouTube channel, spread the word about this campaign or my website:  www.RealHollywoodTrainer.com

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Cindy Yeh. I live in Los Angeles and today 7/15/2013, my beloved laptop that I had just bought with my own hard earned money in December was snatched out of my hands as I was working at Tribal Cafe on Temple Street. The man was 17-20, hispanic, short curly hair, wearing a bright orange t-shirt and had walked by me 2 times and stared me down each time. I had thought in my head I should move into the cafe but I thought I was being paranoid/judgemental/ safe on the patio so I didn't. The third time he threw my hands off my laptop and snatched it and just ran.

I will never forget that feeling of my own possesion being ripped out my hands, while in eye contact with this young man, and then screaming. I chased him down Glendale for 15 minutes screaming please stop, and nobody helped me. Nobody stopped him while i chased him even though I passed at least 14 people. When i asked people at a gas station to help me and drive after him not a single person would. I finally couldnt run anymore, all the while saying to myself why can't you run faster. I have filed a police report and told them I can identity the boy but I am not hopeful. 

So this is my campaign. I am a video editor and i have my life on the computer and now it is all gone. I am devestated and mostly in shock. I dont really feel like leaving my house anymore and I don't feel safe in Echo Park anymore. 

The Impact

I am about to move to New York after an intensive 4 month process of applying for the 12 month fellowship with the NY MoMA. 

I went through intensive interviews and was finally informed 5 days ago. Without a laptop I can't really follow my dreams of doing this work the best I can. 

This is my dream job, I have worked my ass off at the MOCA and other institutions to get ready for this position. I've worked for free I have spent hours working at cafes and resturants to make enough money for rent and food so that I could pursue my dreams of being a video editor and working in the art world. The art world is hard industry for a young asian american woman to make it in, lets be honest. how many women of color can i look up to in this industry. not many. I want to make a difference, and make voices heard, and represent my people and gender in that world. 

This donation would really help me in my next stage of life. I've worked for everything in my life, and after this far of a journey I hope its not my laptop that stunts my future.

What We Need & What You Get

My whole life was in that computer. The designs I was working on, my pieces, everything. If you donate to my cause, to help me get a new computer I will make you an original personalized drawing. Anything you want. Here's my website: www.yehcindy.com.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

This donation would really help me in my next stage of life. I've worked for everything in my life, and after this far of a journey I hope its not my laptop that stunts my future.


What We Need & What You Get
My whole life was in that computer. The designs I was working on, my pieces, everything. If you donate to my cause, to help me get a new computer I will make you an original personalized drawing. Anything you want. Here's my website: www.yehcindy.com.
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Hi!

My name is Jonathan, I'm a YouTuber, photographer, and graphic designer, and I recently graduated college in communications & media. I got a lot out of the program, but an unfortunate byproduct of college is quite a bit of student debt.

I'm someone who's constantly coming up with puns, and the moment I heard Shake it Off was no exception! "Bake it Off!" came to mind, along with what that actually means and what it would look like. The first chance I got I sat down and wrote the lyrics then started planning out the video (and everything that surrounds it). I wanted it to look good, sound good, and promote a positive message. The idea of using baking to pay off my student loans sounded crazy at first, but something told me to just go for it and see what happens! (A philosophy I carry with me every day)

While this might just seem like a campaign to not make me have loans 'til my thirties, Bake it Off! is a lot more than that. The cookbook is different in that it embodies values that aren't always seen in baking. Trying, seeing what happens, failing sometimes, learning... Oh, and having fun! Some recipes have quantities, some don't. I think you can figure out how much icing sugar is too much to sprinkle on those scones! 


25,000$? WHAT?

Making a cookbook is really expensive. Wait, correction: making a cookbook that isn't just boring old text is really expensive. If you're anything like me you'll find that the best part about reading a cookbook is looking at the photos and being like "That. I want THAT, in my mouth, NOW." I want all of you to have that experience when you have my book in your hands.

Apart from the cost of the books themselves, there's other costs like shipping, ISBN, food, fulfilling other perks, and props for the photography itself. This compounded with my current debt brings us up to 25,000$. Basically I break even if we reach our goal.

If we don't reach it you still get your cookbooks and perks, but I can probably forget about being debt free for a little while.

On the other hand, if we EXCEED our goal then things really start to get exciting! Not only will the cookbook have more pages/recipes, but the excess funds could be put towards a scholarship, or campus food banks, or to create some good paying student jobs. Whatever it is, it would be to tackle student debt.



    The Perks!

    This is probably why you're here. Apart from the Bake it Off! cookbook and e-book, there's a ton of different things you can purchase to help the cause! Every perk includes Twitter follows + shoutout (plz include Twitter handle) and most include the e-book. As far as I'm concerned, once you buy a book you should own the e-book too!
    • (1$) Also Broke: Get a Twitter follow + a funny (maybe) shoutout.
    • (5$) Digital Cookies: Get exclusive access to 5 Just Eyeball It! cooking videos months before the general public, along with the Bake it Off! mp3 and the Also Broke perk.
    • (10$) e-Book: Get a PDF version of the book, along with the Digital Cookies perk.
    • (20$) Thank You: I'll make a personal Thank-You video for you (1-2 minutes long.) You also get the e-Book perk.
    • (24$) Earlybird Cookbook: You get the book, and because you're proactive it's cheaper! You also get the e-book perk.
    • (29$) Earlybird Signed Cookbook: You get a signed copy of the book, along with the e-book perk.
    • (29$) Cookbook: It's the same book but at regular price! Why is colour ink so expensive? Includes e-book perk.
    • (34$) Signed Cookbook: It's a signed regular price cookbook! Includes e-book.
    • (40$) Digital Deluxe: Get a 30 minute Skype call with me, along with the e-book.
    • (50$) Book & T-Shirt: Get a Bake it Off! T-shirt along with a signed book and e-book perk.
    • (90$) 24X36 Signed Print: Get a huge print of any photo in the book. It'll look great on your walls! Includes e-book perk.
    • (100$) Name It: Get a recipe in the book named after you. Includes a signed copy of the book and the Digital Deluxe perk.
    • (250$) Super Dedicated: The book is now dedicated to you. Includes a signed book and the Digital Deluxe perk.
    • (500$) YOU in a book: Have photos of you prominently displayed in the book. Includes signed book and Digital Deluxe perk. Does not include transportation. (Photos or transportation + accommodations must be supplied)
    • (1000$) Corporate Sponsor: brand integration! Think about how many people will see these cookbooks!


      Challenges

      Making a cookbook isn't easy, thankfully I've done it before, and I know how to overcome the obstacles faced the first time around. As a designer and a photographer, I don't have to hire external labour to make this project a reality. I just have to stick to my schedule, and shoot on a regular basis. When I made my first cookbook I was also working part-time, studying, and managing marketing / PR for my student association. Not to mention the fact that I was consistently creating content for my YouTube channel. With studies and the student association out of the way, time is no longer an issue. I also just finished organizing an industry YouTube conference called ViralCon. The event was a success, but was a lot of work, and this seems like a piece of cake in comparison.

      As long as I stick to my shooting schedule I'll be fine. Another issue that might arise if a lot of books are sold is the necessity to hire people to help with the campaign. Fortunately, the resulting bulk discount should alleviate those costs in their entirety.


      Other Ways You Can Help

      Just because you can't contribute financially doesn't mean you can't help! Tell your friends and followers about it, and don't forget to use #BakeItOff in all of your social media posts.

Not to mention the fact that I was consistently creating content for my YouTube channel. With studies and the student association out of the way, time is no longer an issue. I also just finished organizing an industry YouTube conference called ViralCon. The event was a success, but was a lot of work, and this seems like a piece of cake in comparison.
As long as I stick to my shooting schedule I'll be fine. Another issue that might arise if a lot of books are sold is the necessity to hire people to help with the campaign. Fortunately, the resulting bulk discount should alleviate those costs in their entirety.

story:
Help to cultivate creativity, self-confidence & communication skills in vulnerable girls & boys who are facing human trafficking and child poverty in Kolkatta, Darjeeling and Varanasi, India through sponsoring performing arts classes offered freely by 8 volunteer teachers with the UK charity Performers Without Borders. 


Summary

WHY:  Who is your favorite teacher? What is the value of art and performance for at-risk youth?

Teaching Performance to vulnerable children gives them the opportunity to explore their potential, to develop confidence, creativity, team building skills and overcome social barriers.

WHO: My name is Lillian Jean Myers, I am a performance visual artist, and  teacher from California living in Kathmandu, Nepal.  I auditioned and was selected to volunteer with an international team of 8 teachers with UK charity Performers Without Borders to bring performing arts  classes to vulnerable children of high child poverty.

HOW: Performers Without borders requires a $1, 200 volunteer donation to enable myself and the ensemble to teach 8 hours a day,  Jan.2nd - May 1st., in addition to a materials fee.

WHAT: The tour involves extensive teaching of performing arts to vulnerable children, an artist show and a children's show. 

WHERE: We are working for four weeks within each organization. The primary organizations are the Hope Foundation in Kolkata, battling human trafficking and the child sex trade ( Jan. 19th- Feb. 17th), Asha Deep in Varanasi (Feb. 19th- March 18th), aiding lower caste children with shelter and education and the Edith Wilkins Foundation in Darjeeling who provides half-way houses and programs to children who are trafficked from South Asian countries ( March 30th - April 27th).


Fundraising goals & what you get!

Get connected and join the circus! :) 

We need your help in the next 30 days we are trying to raise $2,000 to bring free arts education classes to youth!  

 $1,200 required volunteer donation to registered UK based charity Performers Without Borders for operating costs.

$400 for 4 months materials for 400 kids (Specifically art supplies: Set- 30 meter canvas for 4 shows, 8 posts), 25 tubes of paint, mask making & costume supplies, face paint, 400 clown noses, costumes supplies).

$365 for four months teacher insurance.


Feel Free!  Please pull out your card or PayPal and offer a small gift to this larger project with Performers Without Borders, you will feel the benefits tremendously. Any little bit you can offer will help put these classes and tools in the  hands of young people.

Perks

  • $1- We'll blow you a kiss. Thank you so much for taking the time to support teaching at- risk youth art. You've made a statement to the world about something that is important to you and your voice will be heard.

  • $5- Performers Without Borders gifts:  including videos of the shows from the kids and performers, pictures from classes and  and newsletters from the India tour! Come along for the journey and stay connected.

  • $10-A vivacious postcard written just for you from Varanasi, India, the holy city on the river, offering our appreciation and a tiny window into the lives of the children here Plus: Performers Without Borders gifts, including videos of shows, pictures and newsletters from India!

  • $25- Huge Video ShoutOut from the kids making wild theater and a  vivacious postcard written just for you! Plus: Performers Without Borders gifts for you to come along the journey and stay connected.

  • $50- Original printed postcards of photographs and art from children and performers on the  PWB tour in India, Plus: Performers Without Borders gifts (videos and newsletters from India!) Your awesome!

  • $75-  Stunning handmade Nepali & Tibetan jewelry of silver & semi-precious stones from Sajena Crafts in Patan, Kathmandu,  Plus: Performers Without Borders gifts. Thanks for making a statement about what you believe in!

  • $125-Limited edition print of Elephant Ganesh painting by Lillian Myers.  Painted in Kathmandu valley under instruction of master Paubha painters. + Plus: Postcard + Performers Without Borders gifts

  • $200-Photograph 8" x 11" framed print by popular pro photographer Lizzy Myers (www.lizzymontanamyers.com) Plus: Postcard + Performers Without Borders gifts!

  • $350- Take the Cake Handmade Ganesh Painting Print by Lilli Myers + Handmade Tibetan Jewelry from Kathmandu + Original Postcard Pack + A Postcard from India  + Video Shout out + PWB gifts! You are awesome, thanks for making a statement about what you believe in!

  • No worries! If we don't reach our specific donation goal, the project with still happen. I am in Nepal, I have got a bus ticket to Goa to begin training. If the funds are not raised thru IndieGogo, I will apply for grants, and approach individual donors.


The Impact

        CLASSES: My classes happen in tandem with my colleagues professional                   workshops in acrobatics, poi, juggling and clowning.

  • I am offering tools for young girls, who have faced sexism, trafficking, and discrimination to learn skills for self respect and explore their potential and sharpen their identities.  The voice classes focus on public speaking and improvisational theater to help girls move from innocence to confidence. The embodiment classes focus on yoga, self-defense encouraging girls to stand up for themselves. The team work classes focus on problem solving and communication. And the classes in mask making and set painting teach focus and self-expression.

  • Track Record:  I have worked  as a Crisis in Training Actor for the Denver Police Department, a homeschool teacher for youth with Autism, OCD & theater director for kids for 6 years. I Co-fundraised $10,000 for America's Assosiation for the Care of the Children in Nicaragua to construct schools to prevent child labor. And hold BFA from Naropa University in Acting, Dance & Voice and Education.


Risks & Challenges

Confronting crisis is challenging.To look into the eyes of a young child facing human trafficking, hunger, homelessness and sexism is to look into the eyes of our troubled world. Breaks the heart. Fortunately, as an ensemble we will be working everyday to strengthen poor education systems through offering relevant classes.

As teachers whose primary language is English, the language barrier will be an obstacle, thus I am actively studying Hindi, Nepali and Charades.


Other Ways You Can Help

Does the Performers Without Borders project make you jazzed? Join the circus and make a donation! Go  tell your parents, Facebook and your grandma! Use the IndieGogo share tools.

Even braver, audition for the tour next year in India or Nicaragua! Above all, be a role model and rock on with your basically good self!


Thank you very much!

Namaste

Lillian Myers & PWB Ensemble India 2015

www.lillianmyers.com
www.performerswithoutborders.org/uk

story:
New Visions Foundation has just offered AERO its largest matching grant ever--$20,000! We have successfully raised $13,500 so far, but need your help to raise the final $6,500. Every donation is tax-deductible, will be matched dollar for dollar, and help support our work towards making learner-centered education an option for everyone. The resources provided on our website are offered to the public for free and we strive to never turn away parents, educators, or students in need of guidance for financial reasons. 

Your donation will:

  • Help us start more public and independent learner-centered alternative schools
  • Provide information and guidance on alternatives to parents and students in need 
  • Continue providing high-quality resources for educators, parents, and administrators.
  • Provide financial assistance and scholarships to low-income educators and educators from the developing world who want to attend our annual conference
  • Underwrite consultations with alternative schools and educators in need--especially those from the developing world
  • Provide scholarships and financial assistance to our annual school starters course
New Visions Foundation, a social justice education nonprofit, has been a long-time supporter of AERO and its work.

Susan Sarandon supports learner-centered education for everyone, will you?

The Alternative Education Resource Organization (AERO) was founded in 1989 by Jerry Mintz. AERO's goal is to advance student-driven, learner-centered approaches to education. AERO is the primary hub of communications and support for educational alternatives around the world. Our network includes Montessori, Waldorf (Steiner), Public Choice and At-Risk, Democratic, Homeschool, Open, Charter, Free, Sudbury, Holistic, Virtual, Magnet, Early Childhood, Reggio Emilia, Indigo, Krishnamurti, Quaker, Libertarian, Independent, Progressive, Community, Cooperative, and Unschooling.

AERO's mission is to help create an education revolution to make learner-centered education available to everyone.

One of AERO's areas of expertise is democratic process and democratic education, but equally important is the networking of all forms of educational alternatives. Towards this end, AERO provides information, resources and guidance to families, schools and organizations regarding their educational choices. AERO disseminates information internationally on topics such as: homeschooling, public and private alternative schools, and charter schools.

Sir Ken Robinson supports learner-centered education for everyone, will you?

All perks will be made available shortly after the campaign. If you have questions prior to then, please feel free to contact Jerry Mintz at jerryaero@aol.com. 
  • Ebook Options (Level 1+): One Size Does Not Fit All: A Student's Assessment of School by Nikhil Goyal; Turning Points: 35 Visionaries in Education Tell Their Own Stories; and Flood of Conflict: The New Orleans Free School Story by Robert Ferris.
  • Individual AERO Membership (Level 2+): View the full list of member benefits here.
  • Twitter Shout Out (Level 2+): We will ask you for your Twitter handle after the campaign concludes. Follow us on Twitter here.
  • Any Book (Level 3+): You will be able to pick any book from our store here. We will ask you to provide your first and second choices just in case we are out of stock.
  • Facebook Message (Level 3+): We will thank you by name on our Facebook page. However, you also have the option to send a short (200 characters or less) message out to our 9,000+ followers. This is a great opportunity to get a plug in for your school, organization, or project. The message needs to be aligned with our mission and tasteful (we'll be the judge, but think professional/no language/controversial content).
  • Institutional AERO Membership (Level 4+): View the full list of institutional member benefits here.
  • Complete Catalog of AERO's Print Education Titles (Level 4+): Democratic Education: A Beginning of a Story by Yaacov Hecht; Education: Back to the Future by Len Solo; No Homework and Recess All Day: How to Have Freedom and Democracy in Education by Jerry Mintz; The Outside In Book: A Book About Tolerance by Lisa Mintz Harris; The Self-Organizing Revolution: Common Principles of the Educational Alternatives Movement by Ron Miller; and Turning Points: 35 Visionaries in Education Tell Their Own Stories. View descriptions and find out more here.
  • Free One-Hour Consultation (Level 4+): We will contact you to arrange your consultation. For more information, click here.
  • Complete Archive (Level 5+): This is the complete collection of Education Revolution magazines from 1989-2011. A rare an important collection for anyone interested in educational alternatives.
  • Publish on EducationRevolution.org + Newsletter (Level 5+): Have an event to promote or an article/blog post you're passionate about? This is an ideal opportunity to have it viewed by thousands. Our newsletter reaches over 13,000 weekly and our site is viewed more by 50,000 monthly. The post must align with our mission and be tasteful, so nothing about how standardized testing is the greatest assessment method ever invented (we'll be the judge, but think professional/no language/controversial content). You can submit your post at any time after donation. We suggest 500-1,000 max for effectiveness on our website, but we're happy to work with you. The newsletter post will be a snippet/call out directing to either our site or your own.
  • Complimentary Registration to AERO Conference (Level 6+): Sugata Mitra will be the featured keynote speaker and we'll have another outstanding program for our 12th annual conference in 2015. More detail can be found here here. Complimentary registration does not include food or lodging.
  • Free Ad on EducationRevolution.org for 2015 (Level 6+): 600,000 annual unique visitors. Your ad will be featured on every major page of the website. Great for anyone with an organization, event, product, or idea. The ad must align with our mission and be tasteful (we'll be the judge, but think professional/no language/controversial content). You can review the specs and details here. The ad can be posted immediately following your donation.
Questions about any of this? Ask jerryaero@aol.com
